/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with traditional Chinese buildings, their red roofs and white walls standing out against the blue sky. The buildings are adorned with ornate details, adding to the rich cultural heritage of the area. Power lines crisscross above, a modern contrast to the traditional architecture. Cars and bicycles are parked along the side of the street, hinting at the daily life and activity in this part of the city. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
